EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Cloud Native Seminar_Q316.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering! Please see event details below.
Date & Time: ​Friday, ​August 19, ​8.30am​—4.00pm
Location: Suntec Singapore Convention & Exhibition Centre Level 3, MR304 1 Raffles Boulevard Suntec City, Singapore 039593
Please bring your business card/identity card for registration and your laptop for the hands-on technical session.
Questions? Please contact Jade Tan <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]>.
